mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEFECT (DF_NO, DF_ID, DF_TTL, STAT_CD, PRI_CD, DF_CONT, DF_FD_DT, DUE_DT, COMPL_DT, DF_COMPL_CONT, PRJ_NO, WORK_NO, TEST_DTL_NO, MEM_FD_NO, MEM_ACT_NO, FL_MS_ACT_NO, FL_MS_FD_NO) VALUES ( seq_defect.nextval, #{req.defect_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req.defect_ttl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req.defect_cont, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req.discover} )
